That's alot better, RgDaN.

::Scattershot/Punch/The Oblitercons::

Scattershot yells as he is pushed into the bars, the shock sending him flying 
backwards into Liono.

Punch ducks under Tigerhawks shot, activating his comm-link. "Dark One! Get 
your group over here! They're trying to rescue the prisoners!"

He jumps back up, firing at Tigerhawk.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark One, Pyro, Hiss, Breakdown, and Scavanger run through the door, 
immediately noticing the hole in the wall, Breakdown and Scavanger running to 
cover it, firing at Tigerhawk.

"Get the other one, Pyro," Dark One orders, running into the cell and up to 
Iron Raptor. He grabs her by the neck, placing his gun against her head, "Ok, 
Maximal. You move, and they both die. Surrender now."

Pyro runs up to Tavatron, also liting her and pressing his flamethrower 
against her face. Autoguns drop from the cealing and emerge from the wall, 
ready to fire at Tigerhawk.

"Hold the fire," Punch says calmy, the autoguns and the rest of the bots 
obeying. He looks at Tigerhawk.

"All your escape routes have been blocked off," he says, indicating Breakdown 
and Scavanger by the hole and himself and Hiss by the door, "Any move from 
you will get both you and the females instantly killed," he points to the 
autoguns and the other bots' weapons with his free hand, still aiming his gun 
at Tigerhawk, "There is one way for all three to survive: you surrendering."

The rest of the bots wait for Tigerhawk to answer, ready to kill the bot they 
was aiming at.
